channel.title: Making npcs walk like on runescape
channel.description:
So i was wondering if anyone knows how to make npcs walk around in a range, like on rs.
My rangeX1 rangeX2 rangeY1 and rangeY2 don't do anything, the npcs just stand there.
Anyone got the answer?
-- Thanks --

item.title: Making npcs walk like on runescape
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

everyone should consider zubmages advice, hes absolutely right too. Most people don’t know that, thats why your NCP’s always walk through walls because I doesn’t really know where not to walk…so it walks around itself.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2008, 10:53:41 AM[/size][hr][quote=“nobiwa666, post:24, topic:187289”]i think there is also walk type and change it to another number notrmally it is 1 that is on my server so[/quote]

2

item.title: Making npcs walk like on runescape
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Add a monster in autospawn.cfg

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = #### #### #### 0 0 0 0 0 1 ####

Fill in the #'s

Read full topic

item.title: Making npcs walk like on runescape
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat--health npc = 0 Hans 0 0

Change the 0 under health to what you want his hp to be.

item.source: Making npcs walk like on runescape

item.title: Making npcs walk like on runescape
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Yep! Just open it up with Notepad. Use Ctrl+F to open the search box, type in whatever you want to find it, and, assuming what you’ve searched’s there, you’ll jump right to it. Then all you need to do is change the NPC’s HP to whatever you want. Remember, 250 is the magical number, depleting as much HP from an NPC and then continuing will make the NPC’s HP bar ‘reset’.

Oh and, you’ll know which number to change, usually each column of numbers are titled with the appropriate name. Like ‘HP’, or ‘Level’.

Read full topic

item.title: Making npcs walk like on runescape
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Pinsir2005:

I have the same problem, i usually spawn npc’s and monsters yet they do nothing and never have health

Sometimes the NPC you’ve implemented into your server doesn’t have the appropriate HP because they haven’t been granted them. You’ll have to go into a file, usually named “NPC”, then search for the NPC you want, and set it’s HP level.

Read full topic

item.title: Making npcs walk like on runescape
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Imagine that the Rangex1 rangex2 etc is the same thing as making safe areas or non-safe areas.

X1 = Bottom left of the furthest point they can move.
X2 = Bottom Right
Y1 = Top Left
Y2 = Top Right.

You have to make a box or square around where they can move.

Read full topic
